description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for the removal of Conditions 20 (basement impact assessment) and 26 (piling method statement) for Application Reference Number: 22/01104/FUL (Erection of 2no. x new semi-detached dwellings with basements) dated 17/08/2022 as amended by 24/00095/NMA (Non Material Amendment to planning permission 22/01104/FUL (Erection of 2no. x new semi-detached dwellings with basements) to allow removal of both basements from the approved scheme) dated 01/05/2024.
